name: Gangstar City Crime Miami FREE
description:
Once upon a time Tonny Ocean was known as a high powered and ruthless criminal boss, but after chapter of accidents most of his friends betrayed him. Tonny left his hometown and moved to a provincial hick town with the only friend. This town name, Crime Miami, speaks for itself - streets of this city are full of strangers and troubles. Now only you can shape your future. Will you rival with cops? Will you start over your criminal career? Gangster City: Crime Miami 3D FREE – let's get it started.

Only two people are now in your gang, but you are the boss, so you have to accept a decisions and take responsibility for your friends’ life. Huge weapon arsenal at your disposal, also you can steal a car. You’ll take a part in robberies, fire-fights, etc.

Explore the city using the map. Perform tasks and missions to earn money. If you get stuck, you can try using cheats.

Gangster City: Crime Miami 3D FREE game features:
• Large detailed city
• Enhanced graphics, optimized for mobile devices
• Variety of missions and tasks
• Enemies with advanced AI
• Police tracing
• Map & radar
• Different types of weapons: machete, pistol, shotgun, machine gun, grenade, Molotov cocktail
• More than 10 types of vehicles
• Military equipment: a helicopter, a tank
• Purchase of property and businesses
• Earn money by committing various crimes
• Possibility of using cheat-codes
• Realistic special effects
• Collect scattered throughout the city hidden packages and unlock new weapons and vehicles
• Finger-tip control
• March of day and night
• Play offline
• It’d better to save you progress often :)

Be careful: Gangster City: Crime Miami 3D FREE is extremely addictive! You can't stop until you explore every corner of this unfriendly town.
